com.pokerface.pokerapi.util

Class TestCase<T,U>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pokerface.pokerapi.util.TestCase<T,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the input
    U - The type of the expected value

    public class TestCase<T,U>
extends java.lang.Object
    TestCase is a helper class for the testing code. It makes it easy to pack a input value, and an expected value, with an optional method into a single class that can be easily passed around within test.

    This class is useful in the following pattern. 

    
 TestCase[] testCases = new TestCase[]{
     new TestCase<>("a message", new InputValue(1), new ExpectedValue(2)),
     new TestCase<>("another test, new InputValue(2), new ExpectedValue(2))
 }

 for(TestCase<InputValue,ExpectedValue> testCase : testCases) {
     assertEquals(testCase.getMessage(), testCase.getCorrectResult(), testCase.getInput().doWork());
 }
